20101222190055.000|20101222190056.000|CC1|SUPPORT FOR THOSE WHO WERE

20101222190102.000|20101222190104.000|CC1|WOULD BE IN SUPPORT OF THEM.

20101222190106.000|20101222190107.000|CC1|WAS TO REDUCE THE OVERALL COST,

20101222190625.000|20101222190626.000|CC1|WE SAW THAT TODAY REFLECTED IN  
20101222190626.000|20101222190627.000|CC1|THE PRESIDENT'S REMARKS.        
20101222190627.000|20101222190629.000|CC1|THE MEN AND WOMEN I SERVED WITH 
20101222190629.000|20101222190630.000|CC1|IN THE MILITARY IN COMBAT IN    
20101222190630.000|20101222190632.000|CC1|IRAQ, THEY DIDN'T CARE WHO YOU  
20101222190632.000|20101222190633.000|CC1|LOVED OR WHERE YOU SPENT YOUR

20101222192159.000|20101222192200.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20101222192200.000|20101222192201.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20101222192201.000|20101222192205.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20101222192205.000|20101222192205.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20101222192205.000|20101222192206.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20101222192206.000|20101222192206.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20101222192206.000|20101222192209.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20101222192209.000|20101222192211.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20101222192211.000|20101222192213.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20101222192213.000|20101222192213.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20101222192213.000|20101222192215.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20101222192215.000|20101222192215.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20101222192215.000|20101222192217.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20101222192217.000|20101222192217.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20101222192217.000|20101222192219.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20101222192219.000|20101222192221.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20101222192221.000|20101222192221.000|CC1|            by helping          
20101222192221.000|20101222192223.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20101222192223.000|20101222192223.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20101222192223.000|20101222192225.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20101222192225.000|20101222192225.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20101222192225.000|20101222192228.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20101222192228.000|20101222192228.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20101222192228.000|20101222192231.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20101222192231.000|20101222192232.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20101222192232.000|20101222192232.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20101222192232.000|20101222192234.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20101222192234.000|20101222192235.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20101222192235.000|20101222192235.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20101222192235.000|20101222192238.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20101222192238.000|20101222192238.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20101222192238.000|20101222192239.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20101222192239.000|20101222192241.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20101222192241.000|20101222192241.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20101222192241.000|20101222192244.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20101222192244.000|20101222192244.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20101222192244.000|20101222192246.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20101222192246.000|20101222192246.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20101222192246.000|20101222192248.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101222192248.000|20101222192250.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20101222192250.000|20101222192250.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20101222192250.000|20101222192252.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20101222192252.000|20101222192252.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20101222192252.000|20101222192254.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20101222192254.000|20101222192254.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20101222192254.000|20101222192256.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20101222192256.000|20101222192256.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20101222192256.000|20101222192258.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20101222192258.000|20101222192258.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20101222192258.000|20101222192300.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20101222192300.000|20101222192300.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101222192300.000|20101222192303.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20101222192303.000|20101222192304.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20101222192304.000|20101222192306.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20101222192306.000|20101222192306.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20101222192306.000|20101222192308.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20101222192308.000|20101222192308.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20101222192308.000|20101222192311.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20101222192311.000|20101222192311.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20101222192311.000|20101222192314.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.    
20101222192314.000|20101222192315.000|CC1|       NOBODY IN MY FAMILY      
20101222192315.000|20101222192317.000|CC1|    EVER HAD A HEART ATTACK.    
20101222192317.000|20101222192317.000|CC1| IF ANYTHING, I THOUGHT I'D GET 
20101222192317.000|20101222192319.000|CC1| HIT BY A BUS, BUT NOT A HEART. 
20101222192319.000|20101222192319.000|CC1|             MY DOCTOR PUT ME ON

20101222192321.000|20101222192321.000|CC1|                TO HELP PROTECT 
20101222192321.000|20101222192322.000|CC1|                   MY LIFE.     
20101222192322.000|20101222192322.000|CC1|        [ Male Announcer ]
